subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador took control of the Vuelta a España after the former leader Nairo Quintana crashed and lost valuable time during the 10th stage, a time trial won by Tony Martin.
snippet: Alberto Contador took control of the Vuelta a España after the former leader Nairo Quintana crashed and lost valuable time during the 10th stage, a time trial won by Tony Martin.
